def_cn: 撒克逊人(早期为西日耳曼部落成员，后一些人定居在不列颠，被称为盎格鲁撒克逊人)
def_en: In former times, Saxons were members of a West Germanic tribe. Some members of this tribe settled in Britain and were known as Anglo-Saxons .

def_cn: 撒克逊人的;盎格鲁撒克逊人的;英国人的
def_en: Something that is Saxon is related to or characteristic of the ancient Saxons, the Anglo-Saxons, or their descendants.
